title: JPG to PNG Converter - Free & Online | miconvert.com
sub_title: Convert JPG images to PNG format online with transparency, high quality, and no watermarks.
hint: Upload your JPG image to start converting...
description:
Looking for a fast and reliable way to convert JPG to PNG? Our free online JPG to PNG converter helps you transform your images into high-quality PNG files instantly. Whether you need transparency, lossless compression, or compatibility for design projects, this tool is the perfect solution. It works directly in your browser, requires no registration, and keeps your files safe.

PNG format is ideal for professional use, especially when working with graphics, logos, or images that require a transparent background. Unlike JPG, which uses lossy compression and can reduce image quality, PNG maintains sharp details and supports alpha transparency. If you're a designer, student, or business professional, our tool gives you an easy way to enhance your workflow.

head.og_title: JPG to PNG Converter - Free & Online
head.og_description: Convert JPG images into PNG format with transparency and lossless quality. 100% free, fast, and secure.

h1.title: Convert JPG to PNG Online
h1.description: Free and fast JPG to PNG converter with transparency support and lossless quality. Works instantly on any device, no signup required.

h2.title: Why Convert JPG to PNG?
h2.description:
While JPG is great for small file sizes and online sharing, it comes with compression that reduces quality. PNG, on the other hand, is a lossless format that preserves details and supports transparency. Here are the top reasons to use our JPG to PNG converter:

  • Transparency: Create logos, icons, and images without backgrounds.
  • Better Editing: Ideal for design software like Photoshop, Illustrator, and Figma.
  • High Quality: Preserve sharpness, text clarity, and graphic details.
  • Cross-Platform Compatibility: PNG is widely supported across browsers, apps, and operating systems.

h2.title: JPG vs PNG: Key Differences
h2.description:
FeatureJPGPNG
CompressionLossy (smaller but quality loss)Lossless (larger but crisp)
TransparencyNoYes (alpha channel)
Best forPhotos, social sharingLogos, UI, text, graphics
EditingRepeated saving reduces qualityStable across edits

h2.title: How to Convert JPG to PNG Online
h2.description:
Converting JPG to PNG with our tool is simple and takes only a few seconds:

  1. Click on Upload JPG and select your file.
  2. Wait for processing to complete.
  3. Click Download PNG to get your new file.

No technical knowledge required — everything happens in your browser.

h2.title: Supported Limits & Formats
h2.description:
• Accepted input types: image/jpeg, image/jpg
  • Maximum file size: up to 16 MB per file
  • Output: PNG (.png, MIME image/png)
  • Quality: Lossless PNG with adjustable compression level

h2.title: Tips for Better Results
h2.description:
• Use High-Resolution JPGs: The higher the resolution of your JPG, the better your PNG will look.
  • Need Transparency? If your JPG has a background, use our Background Remover first.
  • Optimize File Size: After conversion, use our Image Compressor to reduce PNG size while keeping quality.
  • For the Web: Consider converting PNG to WebP for faster loading.

h2.title: Troubleshooting
h2.description:
• Upload fails: Ensure your file is JPG/JPEG and ≤ 16 MB.
  • No transparency: PNG keeps transparency but cannot extract it from a flat photo — remove the background first.
  • Large PNG output: Use the Image Compressor or switch to WebP.

h2.title: Features of Our JPG to PNG Converter
h2.description:
• Free with no watermarks
  • Fast processing in your browser
  • Secure handling — no account needed
  • Clean UI, mobile-friendly

h2.title: Related Converters
h2.description:
• PNG to JPG
  • JPG to WebP
  • PNG to WebP
  • WebP to PNG

faq.question: Is this JPG to PNG converter free?
faq.answer: Yes, the converter is completely free with no hidden charges or subscriptions.

faq.question: Does PNG support transparency?
faq.answer: Yes, PNG allows transparent backgrounds, making it perfect for logos, icons, and professional designs.

faq.question: Will the image lose quality during conversion?
faq.answer: No. Unlike JPG, PNG uses lossless compression, so your converted images maintain their original quality.

faq.question: What file sizes are supported?
faq.answer: You can upload images up to 16 MB per file. If needed, compress large JPGs before converting.

faq.question: Are my files safe?
faq.answer: Your files are processed automatically and not stored longer than necessary for conversion.

faq.question: Can I convert multiple JPGs at once?
faq.answer: This page converts one file at a time. For bulk needs, repeat the process or use a batch tool.

faq.question: Can I use this tool on my phone?
faq.answer: Absolutely. The converter is optimized for mobile devices and works on iOS and Android browsers.

note: Disclaimer: Conversion quality depends on the input file resolution. Always keep a copy of your original files before editing or converting.
